title: Random FPS Lag spikes!!! Help!
body: So.. My PC isn't the best but when i turn off my setting's and do some stuff ive seen in videos i can get a solid 30-40 fps which makes no lag nothing even when spells get activated... Though for some reason some times in my game i get like lag spikes for 20 seconds that drop to like 4-9 fps which is freaking impossible to play in since I play nidalee with my friend and then i cant hit a damn spear... So any ideas how to fix it?

replies.body:
Since most FPS issues are caused by display driver or windows power settings issues, I suggest taking a look at addressing those items. Our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) covers those two, along with some other common solutions, so it's a good place to start.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
